name: todo-app
description: an app that utilitize routing, templating, node, and sql

scripts.js: cp src/app.js dist/app.js && find src/** -type f -name '*.js' ! -name 'app.js' ! -name 'init.js' -print0 | sort -z | xargs -0 cat -- >>dist/app.js && cat src/init.js >> dist/app.js
scripts.watch: npm run scss && npm run js && npm run watch:scss & npm run watch:js & node app.js
